text: The Last Day of School Before Christmas () is a 1975 drama film written and directed by Gian Vittorio Baldi. It was screened at the 1975 Cannes Film Festival in the Directors' Fortnight section. ==Plot == == Cast == *Macha Méril as Egle *Lino Capolicchio as Erasmo *John Steiner as The Lieutenant *Luca Bonicalzi as Athos *Delia Boccardo as Germana *Riccardo Cucciolla as Ambro *Lidia Biondi as Prostitute *Laura Betti as Passenger *Giovanella Grifeo as Girl of Remembrance *Lou Castel as Partisan ==References== ==External links== * Category:1970s Christmas drama films Category:Italian films Category:Italian Christmas drama films Category:1975 drama films
title: The Last Day of School Before Christmas
